description: Adds tags to the specified applied quota. You can include one or more tags to add to the quota.

parameters.name: ResourceARN
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the applied quota. You can get this information by using the Service Quotas console, or by listing the quotas using the list-service-quotas CLI command or the ListServiceQuotas Amazon Web Services API operation.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: The tags that you want to add to the resource. (dict) --- A complex data type that contains a tag key and tag value. A string that contains a tag key. The string length should be between 1 and 128 characters. Valid characters include a-z, A-Z, 0-9, space, and the special characters _ - . : / = + @. A string that contains an optional tag value. The string length should be between 0 and 256 characters. : / = + @.

nested_params.name: Key
nested_params.description: A string that contains a tag key. The string length should be between 1 and 128 characters. Valid characters include a-z, A-Z, 0-9, space, and the special characters _ - . : / = + @.

nested_params.name: Value
nested_params.description: A string that contains an optional tag value. The string length should be between 0 and 256 characters. Valid characters include a-z, A-Z, 0-9, space, and the special characters _ - . : / = + @.
